title: Professional Resume Template Generator
goal: Create a modern, ATS-friendly resume customized for a job or industry.
prompt: Generate a professional, ATS-friendly resume template for {job_role/industry}. Include the following sections: Contact details, Summary or professional profile, Skills section, Work experience (with measurable achievements), Education, Projects (with key outcomes and tools used).

responses.gpt-5:

## **Professional Summary**

responses.gemini-2.5:
Here is a professional, ATS-friendly resume template for a Software Developer. This format prioritizes clear headings, standard fonts, and minimal graphic elements, making it easy for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) to parse.

## ðŸš€ Software Developer Resume Template

***

### ðŸ‘¤ Contact Details

| Field | Information |
| :--- | :--- |
| **Name** | **[Your Full Name]** |
| **Phone** | (555) 123-4567 |
| **Email** | your.email@example.com |
| **LinkedIn** | [linkedin.com/in/yourprofile](https://linkedin.com/in/yourprofile) |
| **GitHub** | [github.com/yourusername](https://github.com/yourusername) |
| **Portfolio** | yourpersonalwebsite.com (Optional) |

***

### ðŸ“ Summary or Professional Profile

Highly motivated and results-driven **Software Developer** with **[X] years** of experience in the full software development lifecycle, from concept to deployment. Proficient in **[Primary Language, e.g., Python]** and experienced in building scalable **[e.g., RESTful APIs/web applications]**. Seeking to leverage strong problem-solving skills and expertise in **[Key Technical Area, e.g., cloud computing]** to contribute to innovative projects at [Company Name].

***

### ðŸ› ï¸ Skills Section

To maximize ATS parsing, list skills in distinct, categorized groups.

| Category | Skills |
| :--- | :--- |
| **Programming Languages** | Python, Java, JavaScript, C++, Go, SQL, HTML5, CSS3 |
| **Frameworks & Libraries** | React, Angular, Node.js, Spring Boot, Django, Flask, jQuery |
| **Databases** | PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra |
| **Cloud & DevOps** | AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD, Git, Jenkins |
| **Testing & Tools** | Jest, JUnit, Selenium, Postman, Jira, Confluence, VS Code |
| **Methodologies** | Agile, Scrum, Kanban, TDD (Test-Driven Development) |

***

### ðŸ¢ Work Experience

Use the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result) to frame achievements with **measurable outcomes** (quantifiable data).

#### **[Job Title, e.g., Senior Software Engineer]**  
**[Company Name]** | [City, State] | [Start Date] â€“ [End Date]

* **Developed and maintained** a core microservice using **[Technology 1]** and **[Technology 2]** that handled over **1 million daily transactions**, improving system reliability by **15%**.  
* **Led the migration** of a legacy monolithic application to a scalable, containerized architecture using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, resulting in a **40% reduction** in deployment time.  
* **Optimized database queries** (PostgreSQL) and application code, which **decreased average API response time from 500ms to 150ms** (a 70% improvement).  
* **Mentored 3 junior developers** on best practices for code reviews, unit testing, and Git workflows, increasing team efficiency by **20%**.

#### **[Job Title, e.g., Junior Developer]**  
**[Company Name]** | [City, State] | [Start Date] â€“ [End Date]

* Contributed to the front-end development of the customer-facing portal using **React** and **Redux**, increasing user engagement by **10%**.  
* Wrote comprehensive **unit and integration tests** (using Jest) for new features, achieving **95% code coverage** for critical components.

***

### ðŸŽ“ Education

#### **[Degree Name, e.g., Master of Science in Computer Science]**  
**[University Name]** | [City, State] | [Graduation Year]

* *Optional: Relevant Coursework or GPA (if > 3.5/4.0)*

#### **[Degree Name, e.g., Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering]**  
**[University Name]** | [City, State] | [Graduation Year]

***

### ðŸ’¡ Projects

Highlight personal or open-source projects to showcase initiative and skill application. Include the technologies used and a key, measurable outcome.

#### **[Project Name, e.g., Real-Time Chat Application]**  
**[Link to GitHub/Deployed Site]** | [Month, Year]

* **Description:** Developed a full-stack, real-time messaging application with user authentication and persistent storage.  
* **Key Outcomes:** Successfully handled **1,000 concurrent connections** in stress tests. Implemented end-to-end encryption using the **WebSockets** protocol.  
* **Tools Used:** Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Socket.IO, React.

#### **[Project Name, e.g., E-commerce API Backend]**  
**[Link to GitHub]** | [Month, Year]

* **Description:** Built a robust RESTful API for an e-commerce platform, including product, order, and payment management endpoints.  
* **Key Outcomes:** Designed and normalized the relational database schema (PostgreSQL) to minimize redundancy and optimized **6 critical API endpoints** to respond in under **200ms**.  
* **Tools Used:** Python, Django Rest Framework, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS EC2.

***

### Next Step

Would you like me to refine this template for a specific software development role, such as a **Front-End Developer** or a **Data Scientist**?
responses.claude-3:
# JOHN ALEXANDER SMITH

**San Francisco, CA 94105** | **(415) 555-0123** | **john.smith@email.com** | **linkedin.com/in/johnsmith** | **github.com/johnsmith**

---

## PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Results-driven Software Developer with 5+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications and backend systems. Proven expertise in full-stack development using modern technologies including React, Node.js, and cloud platforms. Track record of delivering high-quality code while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams and mentoring junior developers.

---

## SKILLS

**Programming Languages:** Python, JavaScript, Java, SQL, TypeScript, C++  
**Frontend Development:** React, Vue.js, HTML5, CSS3, Redux, Material-UI, Responsive Design  
**Backend Development:** Node.js, Express, Django, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Microservices  
**Databases:** PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Firebase  
**Cloud & DevOps:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, CI/CD Pipelines  
**Tools & Platforms:** Git, JIRA, Figma, Jenkins, Visual Studio Code, Postman  
**Methodologies:** Agile/Scrum, Test-Driven Development, Object-Oriented Design

---

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

**Senior Software Developer | TechVision Solutions, San Francisco, CA | January 2022 â€“ Present**  
- Architected and led development of a microservices-based payment processing platform serving 50,000+ transactions daily, reducing processing time by 40% and increasing system reliability to 99.95% uptime.  
- Mentored 3 junior developers on best practices in code quality, design patterns, and full-stack development, resulting in improved code review scores and faster onboarding times.  
- Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, serving 2 million+ monthly requests with average response times under 150ms.  
- Optimized database queries and implemented Redis caching strategies, reducing database load by 35% and improving application performance by 25%.  
- Collaborated with product and design teams using Agile methodology to deliver 8+ feature releases within planned timelines and budget.

**Software Developer | CloudFirst Technologies, San Francisco, CA | July 2019 â€“ December 2021**  
- Developed responsive full-stack web applications using React and Node.js, supporting 20,000+ concurrent users.  
- Built and maintained 12+ RESTful APIs handling authentication, authorization, and data management for a SaaS platform serving enterprise clients.  
- Implemented comprehensive testing strategies including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests, achieving 85% code coverage and reducing production bugs by 50%.  
- Deployed applications to AWS infrastructure using Docker and Kubernetes, managing containerization and orchestration for scaling operations.  
- Participated in on-call rotation and resolved critical production issues with average resolution time of 45 minutes.

**Junior Software Developer | Digital Innovations Inc., San Jose, CA | June 2018 â€“ June 2019**  
- Contributed to the development of customer-facing features for a web-based analytics platform using React and JavaScript.  
- Fixed 200+ bugs and improved existing functionality, resulting in enhanced user experience and a 15% increase in customer retention.  
- Wrote clean, maintainable code following established coding standards and participated in daily code reviews.  
- Assisted in database optimization efforts that improved query performance by 20%.

---

## EDUCATION

**Bachelor of Science in Computer Science | University of California, Berkeley | May 2018**  
Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Software Engineering, Web Development  

**AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate | Amazon Web Services | March 2022**  
**Google Cloud Professional Cloud Developer Certification | Google Cloud | September 2021**

---

## PROJECTS

**Real-Time Collaboration Platform | Personal Project | 2023**  
- Engineered a web-based collaborative document editor supporting real-time multi-user editing and commenting with WebSocket integration.  
- Implemented using React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Socket.io, achieving sub-100ms latency for document synchronization.  
- Deployed on AWS with auto-scaling capability, handling 5,000+ concurrent users.  
- Result: 2,000+ GitHub stars and featured in tech publications.

**E-Commerce Analytics Dashboard | TechVision Solutions | 2022**  
- Built interactive analytics dashboard providing real-time insights into sales, inventory, and customer behavior.  
- Utilized React for the frontend, Node.js backend APIs, and PostgreSQL for data storage with advanced aggregation queries.  
- Integrated Stripe payment tracking and Google Analytics data sources.  
- Outcome: Reduced time spent on reporting by 60%, enabling management to make data-driven decisions 25% faster.

**Machine Learning Integration Service | CloudFirst Technologies | 2021**  
- Developed Python microservice integrating TensorFlow models for predictive analytics.  
- Created RESTful API endpoints and implemented model versioning system supporting A/B testing.  
- Containerized service using Docker and deployed to Kubernetes clusters.  
- Impact: Improved recommendation accuracy by 18%, increasing user engagement by 12%.

---

## ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

**Languages:** English (Native), Spanish (Intermediate)  
**Open Source:** Active contributor to popular React ecosystem projects with 500+ combined contributions
